name: PewDiePie's Shopping Cart Adventure
description:
This is a game base on Pewds' shopping cart picture.

  • It's really stupid and there might still be a few bugs left.
  • The objective is to return the shopping to the stand at the end of the road, across the park. 
  • Try to avoid hitting people or you might be demonetized. 
  • Grab monetized signs to decrease your timer.

I might also add multiplayer and a level editor later, if the game receives some attention.
